title: Teleport Bug Again?
body:
I was playing a few games yesterday, and a bug that used to occur with teleport started happening again.
When I was teleporting and using an ability straight afterwards, it would shoot the ability backwards.
Rito, please fix.

replies.body:
It's probably related to how your cursor updates versus the map/camera location.

Bug reports belong [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
